quotes.text: Design is a solution to a problem. Art is a question to a problem.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.text: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.text: The moment you take responsibility for everything in your life is the moment you can change anything in your life.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.text: If you donâ€™t ask, the answer will always be no.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You can't change the people around you but you can change the people around you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If the path before you is clear, you're probably on someone else's.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: The day you plant the seed is not the day you eat the fruit.
quotes.author: Fabienne Fredrickson

quotes.text: Perfection is a road, not a destination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Because she competes with no one, no one can compete with her.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu, Tao Te Ching

quotes.text: An expert is someone who has made every possible mistake in a very narrow field.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.text: Efficiency is doing things right, effectiveness is doing the right things.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Pain of discipline or pain of regret, choose yours.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Have no fear of perfection, you'll never reach it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.text: The bullet isn't dangerous until it starts moving.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is falling down seven times and getting up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese proverb

quotes.text: The only limit to our achievement tomorrow will be our doubts today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is having what you want. Happiness is wanting what you have.
quotes.author: W.P. Kinsella
